title: Covid-19: PM to give update as schools closed until March
content:
1. Covid-19: PM to give update as schools closed until March  BBC News
  2. Boris Johnson 'Deeply Sorry' As U.K. Covid Toll Passes 100000 | NBC News NOW  NBC News
  3. UK imposes hotel quarantine for travelers from Covid hotspots  CNN
  4. Here are five ways the government could have avoided 100,000 Covid deaths  The Guardian
  5. Covid deaths: 'Hard to compute sorrow' of 100,000 milestone - PM  BBC News
